name: Kebab Mayhem
description:
Kebab Mayhem is a adventure game made for the GM20 Jam.
It has pixelart style and 8-bit music.
Your goal is to find all the kebabs using 20 INPUTS because you're fat.
It's not really that hard when you play it for a few minutes, it's just a pretty challenging game.

If you beat the game with two hands and then with only one hand then you'll get the true ending.

Every input:
Q+R - Left Up
W+T - Up
E+Y - Right Up
D+H - Right
C+N - Right Down
X+B - Down
Z+V - Left Down
A+F - Left
Down Arrow + Right Arrow - Allows moving in one hand mode
Space - Select
Note: You can press CTRL during the game to see every input

I hope you'll enjoy it ;)
Brb I'm gonna eat a kebab

Music: https://ozzed.bandcamp.com/
